### This file is automatically generated by Qt Design Studio.
### Do not change

set(PNG_FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/content/images/*.png)

file(GLOB PNG_RESOURCES ${PNG_FILES})

qt_add_library(content STATIC)
qt6_add_qml_module(content
    URI "content"
    VERSION 1.0
    QML_FILES
        App.qml
        Screen01.ui.qml
        ModsListFile.qml
        RightPanel.qml
        TopMenu.qml
        BottomGameMenu.qml
        SettingsModule.qml
        GameSelector.qml
        InfoBox.qml
    RESOURCES
# fonts
        fonts/fonts.txt

# backgrounds
        images/gameBackgrounds/background_0.png
        images/gameBackgrounds/background_1142710.png
        images/gameBackgrounds/background_594570.png


# icons
        images/capybaraIcon.png
        images/discord.png
        images/discordLight.png
        images/patreon.png
        images/patreonLight.png
        images/icons/downloadGreen.png
        images/icons/downloadRed.png
        images/icons/downloadGreenLight.png
        images/icons/refreshIcon64.png
        images/icons/refreshIcon64Light.png
)
